briefdescription.para: List of active (queued or running) tasks. Includes subtasks.
Tracks the next unique task ID.
List of parent tasks.
List of subtasks.
Constructor for QgsTaskManager.
Returns a list of the active (queued or running) tasks.
Adds a task to the manager.

detaileddescription.para:
Ownership of the task is transferred to the manager, and the task manager will be responsible for starting the task. The priority argument can be used to control the run queue's order of execution, with larger numbers taking precedence over lower priority numbers.
unique task ID, or 0 if task could not be added

briefdescription.para: Adds a task to the manager, using a full task definition (including dependency handling).

detaileddescription.para:
Ownership of the task is transferred to the manager, and the task manager will be responsible for starting the task. The priority argument can be used to control the run queue's order of execution, with larger numbers taking precedence over lower priority numbers.
unique task ID, or 0 if task could not be added

briefdescription.para: Instructs all tasks tracked by the manager to terminate.

detaileddescription.para: Individual tasks may take some time to cancel, or may totally ignore this instruction. Calling this does not block but will instead signal the tasks to cancel and then return immediately.

briefdescription.para: Returns the number of tasks tracked by the manager.
Returns the number of active (queued or running) tasks.
Returns the set of task IDs on which a task is dependent.
Returns true if all dependencies for the specified task are satisfied.
Returns a list of layers on which as task is dependent.

detaileddescription.para:
The task will automatically be canceled if any of these layers are above to be removed.
taskId
task ID
list of layers
tasksDependentOnLayer()

briefdescription.para: Returns the task with matching ID.
Returns the unique task ID corresponding to a task managed by the class.

simplesect.para: task ID, or -1 if task not found

briefdescription.para: Returns all tasks tracked by the manager.
Returns a list of tasks which depend on a layer.
Triggers a task, e.g.

detaileddescription.para:
as a result of a GUI interaction.
taskTriggered()

briefdescription.para: Emitted when all tasks are complete.
Emitted when the number of active tasks changes.
Will be emitted when only a single task remains to complete and that task has reported a progress change.
Will be emitted when a task reports a progress change.
Will be emitted when a task reports a status change.
Emitted when a task is about to be deleted.
Emitted when a new task has been added to the manager.
Emitted when a task is triggered.

detaileddescription.para:
This occurs when a user clicks on the task from the QGIS GUI, and can be used to show detailed progress reports or re-open a related dialog.
triggerTask()

memberdef.argsstring: (QgsTask *task, QgsTaskList dependencies, bool isSubTask, int priority)
memberdef.name: addTaskPrivate

briefdescription.para: Recursively cancel dependent tasks.

parameterdescription.para: id of terminated task to cancel any other tasks which are dependent on

briefdescription.para: Will return true if the specified task has circular dependencies.
Process the queue of outstanding jobs and starts up any which are ready to go.

memberdef.argsstring: (long firstTaskId, long currentTaskId, QSet< long > &results) const
memberdef.name: resolveDependencies

briefdescription.para: Task manager for managing a set of long-running QgsTask tasks.

detaileddescription.para:
This class can be created directly, or accessed via QgsApplication::taskManager().
QGIS 3.0
